                                              CommandMetadata command)
                                       throws IOException

        Parameters:
        out - Usage printer
        programName - Program name
        groupNames - Group name(s)
        commandName - Command name
        command - Command meta-data
        Returns:
        Collection of all options (Global, Group and Command)
